sp.l: Wits, like physicians never can agree,
New plays are stuffed with wits, and with deboches,
That crowd and sweat like cits in May-Day coaches.

prologue.trailer: Written by a person of quality

sp.l: 何時姊妹再相逢，雷電轟轟雨蒙蒙？
且等烽煙靜四陲，敗軍高奏凱歌回。
美即丑惡丑即美，翱翔毒霧妖云里。
